an6.115:1.5: Imesam kho, bhikkhave, tinnam dhammanam pahanaya tayo dhamma bhavetabba.
an6.115:1.7: Dovacassataya pahanaya sovacassata bhavetabba, papamittataya pahanaya kalyanamittata bhavetabba, cetaso vikkhepassa pahanaya anapanassati bhavetabba.
an6.115:1.8: Imesam kho, bhikkhave, tinnam dhammanam pahanaya ime tayo dhamma bhavetabba”ti.
